Personal and Business Taxation

You will develop your knowledge and understanding of the UK taxation policy as applicable to individuals, single companies, and groups of companies with the latest United Kingdom Finance Act which received Royal Assent. You will explore the application of the technical knowledge and professional judgement to identify and critically appraise alternative tax treatments to personal and business taxation issues.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand the role, structure and general principles of a country's taxation system.

+  Explain the taxation and compliance obligations of individuals and businesses/companies.

+  Construct business taxation computations (unincorporated and incorporated).

+  Explain and compute the corporation tax liabilities of individual companies and groups of companies.

+  Construct personal computations for individuals.
